title: Runtime crash gotsync'ing large local tree to remote NFS mount
body:
gotsync crashes when syncing large directory trees (full Android checkout) to NFS
servers.

gotsync source code:
http://github.com/bradfitz/gotsync

Reproduce:
 
$ gotsync -v --android=true /path/to/android-source /mnt/nfs/somepath/

What is the expected output?

Success at end.

What do you see instead?

Pages of goroutine stacks.  Can't find the exact failure.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

linux/amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

f776656df34c release.2010-06-09/release

Please provide any additional information below.

Russ has seen this in person and wanted me to file a bug.
